a violent shaking: The car gave a sudden judder, then stopped dead. You can feel the bouncing judder of the bridge as you walk across. Synonym
shake
More examplesFewer examplesJudders caused by turbulence make it difficult to use a computer’s touchpad on a flight. The train glided off, levitating on an electromagnetic cushion that propelled it with barely a judder.We could feel the judder as we drove over the cobbles.
